text: The Techno 293 is a development of the Aloha class and is primarily for the youth windsurfing class. The class is recognised by the International Sailing Federation. The design was chosen to be the windsurfer for the Youth Olympic Games. ==Events== ===World Championships=== The techno 293 world championships have been held annually since 2006. ===Open Under 17=== {| |- | 2006 Marsala, Sicily (ITA) | | | |} ===Open Under 15=== {| |- | 2006 Marsala, Sicily (ITA) | | | |} ===Male Under 17=== {| |- | 2007 Formentera | | | |- | 2008 Sopot | | | |- | 2009 Portland | | | |- | 2010 Martigues | | | |- | 2011 San Francisco | | | |- | 2012 Medemblik | | | |- | 2013 Sopot | | | |- | 2014 Brest | | | |- | 2015 | | | |- | 2016 | | | |- | 2017 | | | |- | 2018 Liepāja | | | |- | 2019 Puerto Sherry | | | |} ===Male Under 15=== {| |- | 2007 Formentera | | | |- | 2008 Sopot | | | |- | 2009 Portland | | | |- | 2010 Martigues | | | |- | 2011 San Francisco | | | |- | 2012 Medemblik | | | |- | 2013 Sopot | | | |- | 2014 Brest | | | |- | 2015 | | | |- | 2016 | | | |- | 2017 | | | |- | 2018 Liepāja | | | |- | 2019 Puerto Sherry | | | |} ===Female Under 17=== {| |- | 2007 Formentera | | | |- | 2008 Sopot | | | |- | 2009 Portland | | | |- | 2010 Martigues | | | |- | 2011 San Francisco | | | |- | 2012 Medemblik | | | |- | 2013 Sopot | | | |- | 2014 Brest | | | |- | 2015 | | | |- | 2016 | | | |- | 2017 | | | |- | 2018 Liepāja | | | |- | 2019 Puerto Sherry | | | |} ===Female Under 15=== {| |- | 2007 Formentera | | | |- | 2008 Sopot | | | |- | 2009 Portland | | | |- | 2010 Martigues | | | |- | 2011 San Francisco | | | |- | 2012 Medemblik | | | |- | 2013 Sopot | | | |- | 2014 Brest | | | |- | 2015 | | | |- | 2016 | | | |- | 2017 | | | |- | 2018 Liepāja | | | |- | 2019 Puerto Sherry | | | |} ===Youth Olympics=== The class has been used at the Youth Olympics ==References== ==External links== * International Class Association Website * ISAF Techno 293 Microsite Website * ISAF Homepage Category:Classes of World Sailing Category:Windsurfing equipment Category:Youth Olympic sailing classes
